description:
A catastrophic event in 2019 causes two parallel worlds meet. It`s now 2029 and True Japan has censored all unacceptable culture in an effort to unify both Japans. As Hosomichi struggles in this world, he discovers otaku that are still putting up a fight.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: I`d Like to Turn the Tables with You (If Possible)!
きみと(出来れば)逆転したい!
